direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods check for the presence of a key in the map, with 'get' returning the value and 'containsKey' returning a boolean.
Both methods interact with the map to either retrieve or remove an entry based on the key.
Both methods modify the map, with 'put' adding or updating an entry and 'get' retrieving an entry.
Both methods involve checking the expiration status of an entry and potentially removing it.
Both methods handle the removal of entries based on expiration criteria.
The 'get' method relies on the 'isExpired' method to determine if an entry should be removed before retrieval.
The 'get' method uses the 'now' method to get the current time for expiration checks.
